A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a standalone space fantasy movie its OK...counting out some big plot flaws and implausible character interaction. Biggest problem with the movie is that it completely disregards character traits\, technology assumptions and plot lines that made-up the starwars world. Its easy to make up unexpected plot twists if you don't have to worry if they make sense or build on top of the plot set up so far.....very sloppy chapter.....if this franchise survives this it will not be about the \"story\" anymore...
